column6:
1. Open Flipkart
2. Search Samsung S24
3. Check first 10 results
column7: Only Samsung S24 models should appear
column8: Tested on Chrome, Edge, Firefox on Laptop and Mobile — all results were relevant. No issue observed.

column3: Add to Cart button missing on some listings
column6:
1. Search any phone
2. Open multiple product pages
column8: Button visible on all tested products across browsers & devices.

column3: Total price not updating on quantity change
column6:
1. Add product to cart
2. Change quantity
column8: Price updated correctly on all devices & browsers.
